text:
Major: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent target

text: Major: deal 4 damage to a target\n\nMinor: Regain 2 health

name: Necromancer

name: Bandit
text: Major: Deal 4 Physical damage to an adjacent target

name: Bandit Soldier

name: Bandit Slinger

name: Bandit Captain
text: Major: Deal 6 Physical damage to an adjacent target\n\nMinor: Other Ally Bandits deal +1 damage until your next turn.

name: Bandit Lord

name: Roc
text: 2: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent target. That target must attack the Roc on its next turn.
